hadiths.text: Narrated `Uqba bin 'Amir:that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) gave him some sheep to distribute among his companions in order to sacrifice them and a kid was left. He told the Prophet (ﷺ) about it and the Prophet (ﷺ) said to him, "Sacrifice it on your behalf

chapter.eng-name: Distribution of sheep and dividing them justly
